name: Occultist
description: While not a member of one of the major cults in the area, you were a student of the Beyond before the Cataclysm and had experimented with the properties of anomalous materials.  And it's a good thing, because you'll need that knowledge now more than ever.

name: Sorcerer
description: While not a member of one of the major cults in the area, you were a student of the Beyond before the Cataclysm and had delved into the power of sorcery.  And it's a good thing, because you'll need that knowledge now more than ever.
